## Public Member Functions

### getMinNumElements() {#aa7473a4e5eb5a49846c0c161a5e56d2a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::ScalableVectorType::getMinNumElements () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Get the minimum number of elements in this vector.

The actual number of elements in the vector is an integer multiple of this value.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h/#l00658">658</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h">DerivedTypes.h</a>.
